articles.author: Pete Muntean
articles.title: Airlines suspend workers for posts about shooting of Charlie Kirk - CNN
articles.description: Delta Air Lines, American Airlines and United Airlines say they have suspended workers for social media posts about last week’s fatal shooting of Charlie Kirk.
articles.content:
Delta Air Lines, American Airlines and United Airlines say they have suspended workers for social media posts about last weeks fatal shooting of Charlie Kirk.
